com.ning.billing.analytics.api.user
Interface AnalyticsUserApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAnalyticsUserApi
public interface AnalyticsUserApi

The interface AnalyticsUserApi is used to retrieve analytics information on a pre tenant basis

getSubscriptionsCreatedOverTime

TimeSeriesData getSubscriptionsCreatedOverTime(String productType,
                                               String slug,
                                               TenantContext context)
Parameters:
productType - catalog name
slug - plan phase name, as returned by PlanPhase#getName()
Returns:
the number of new subscriptions created per day (transfers not included)

rebuildAnalyticsForAccount

void rebuildAnalyticsForAccount(Account account,
                                CallContext context)
Rebuild all analytics tables for an account based on the Killbill row tables

This endpoint should only be used when those tables are not in sync due (bugs?)

Parameters:
account - account
context - call context
